name: Synergy-Core
description:
How well synergized are your hands, captain?

Use the arrow/WASD keys and the mouse to control the transmitters and influence the position of the Synergy-Core as it flies through cyberspace!

How far can you transmit the Synergy-Core without corruption?

jaymaykingames.com

Special thanks to Eamon for his input on the color scheme, Mitch for his musical talent and Thomas for supplying the voicework.

(NOTE: Some browsers may attempt to discard the .zip file when downloading. Whilst I'm flattered, to fix this, simply click the arrow and select "keep")
